sect1.title: Available Documentation
sect1.para: The following documentation is available for &obsa;:

listitem.para: This guide offers information about the initial setup and maintenance for running &obs; instances.

This guide is intended for users of &obs;. The first part describes basic workflows for working with packages on &obs;. This includes checking out a package from an upstream project, creating patches, branching a repository, and more. The following parts go into more detail and contain information on backgrounds, setting up your computer for working with &obsa;, and usage scenarios. The Best Practices part offers step-by-step instructions for the most common features of the &obs; and the &osbs;. The last part covers ideas and motivations, concepts and processes of the &obs;.
